title: update mistral API specification (300 changes)
body:
### Breaking changes

- **GET /v1/agents**: Added minimum constraint to page (must be >= 0).
- **GET /v1/agents**: Added constraints to page_size (min 1, max 1000).
- **PATCH /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: Added deployment_chat (boolean) to Agent response and marked it required.
- **PATCH /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: Added source (string) to Agent response and marked it required.
- **PATCH /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: Added versions (array of integers) to Agent response and marked it required.
- **POST /v1/conversations**: tools no longer accepts null; it must be an array if provided (description also added).
- **POST /v1/conversations#stream**: tools is no longer nullable; remove passing tools: null. It must be an array if provided.
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}**: Response messages may now include the 'thinking' content chunk (ThinkChunk).
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}**: ToolFileChunk.tool in responses now may be any string in addition to built-in connectors.
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}**: ToolReferenceChunk.tool in responses now may be any string in addition to built-in connectors.
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}**: ToolExecutionEntry.name in responses now may be any string (custom tool) as well as built-ins.
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}**: usage.connectors now allows arbitrary connector keys; propertyNames constraint limiting keys to built-ins was removed.
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}#stream**: Added ThinkChunk (type="thinking") in streamed MessageOutputEvent content; clients must handle new chunk type.
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}#stream**: Broadened tool/name fields in stream to allow arbitrary strings (may break enum-typed clients): ToolExecution*Event.name and MessageOutputEvent content ToolFileChunk.tool/ToolReferenceChunk.tool.
- **GET /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/history**: Added new content variant ThinkChunk (type "thinking") to MessageInputEntry content chunks.
- **GET /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/history**: Added new content variant ThinkChunk (type "thinking") to MessageOutputEntry content chunks.
- **GET /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/messages**: Added new 'thinking' content chunk (ThinkChunk) to message input content.
- **GET /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/messages**: Added new 'thinking' content chunk (ThinkChunk) to message output content.
- **GET /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/messages**: Relaxed MessageInput ToolFileChunk.tool from fixed enum to any string (enum|string).
- **GET /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/messages**: Relaxed MessageOutput ToolFileChunk.tool from fixed enum to any string (enum|string).
- **GET /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/messages**: Relaxed MessageOutput ToolReferenceChunk.tool from fixed enum to any string (enum|string).
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/restart**: Responses may now include structured thinking content (ThinkChunk) in message content; clients must handle a new chunk type with type="thinking".
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/restart**: ToolFileChunk.tool in responses may now be any string (not only built-in connectors).
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/restart**: ToolReferenceChunk.tool in responses may now be any string (not only built-in connectors).
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/restart**: ToolExecutionEntry.name in responses may now be any string (not only built-in connectors).
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/restart**: usage.connectors now allows arbitrary keys (not restricted to built-in connector names).
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/restart#stream**: Relaxed tool identifiers in streamed output content (ToolFileChunk.tool, ToolReferenceChunk.tool) to allow any string; clients assuming only built-ins may break.
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/restart#stream**: ToolExecutionStarted/Delta/Done event name now accepts arbitrary strings; clients expecting only built-ins may break.
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/restart#stream**: usage.connectors in ResponseDoneEvent is now a generic map (keys not restricted to built-ins).
- **GET /v1/files**: Response property total is now optional and may be null instead of always-present integer.
- **POST /v1/fim/completions**: Changed default model from codestral-2405 to codestral-2404 and updated docs/examples.
- **GET /v1/libraries**: owner_id in library items is now nullable (string uuid or null)
- **POST /v1/libraries**: Response field owner_id is now nullable (string or null) instead of strictly string.
- **DELETE /v1/libraries/{library_id}**: owner_id in 200 response is now nullable (string or null) instead of always string.
- **GET /v1/libraries/{library_id}**: owner_id in 200-response is now nullable (anyOf string uuid or null) instead of a required non-null string.
- **PUT /v1/libraries/{library_id}**: owner_id in 200 response is now nullable (anyOf string or null) instead of non-null string
- **GET /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents**: Added minimum=1 and maximum=100 constraints to page_size query parameter.
- **GET /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents**: Added minimum=0 constraint to page query parameter.
- **GET /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents**: DocumentOut.extension type changed from string to string|null.
- **GET /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents**: DocumentOut.hash type changed from string to string|null.
- **GET /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents**: DocumentOut.mime_type type changed from string to string|null.
- **GET /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents**: DocumentOut.size type changed from integer to integer|null.
- **GET /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents**: DocumentOut.uploaded_by_id type changed from uuid string to uuid string|null.
- **POST /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents**: 'extension' is now nullable (string|null) in DocumentOut for 200/201 responses.
- **POST /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents**: 'hash' is now nullable (string|null) in DocumentOut for 200/201 responses.
- **POST /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents**: 'mime_type' is now nullable (string|null) in DocumentOut for 200/201 responses.
- **POST /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents**: 'size' is now nullable (integer|null) in DocumentOut for 200/201 responses.
- **POST /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents**: 'uploaded_by_id' is now nullable (uuid string|null) in DocumentOut for 200/201 responses.
- **GET /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents/{document_id}**: 'extension' can now be null (was string).
- **GET /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents/{document_id}**: 'hash' can now be null (was string).
- **GET /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents/{document_id}**: 'mime_type' can now be null (was string).
- **GET /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents/{document_id}**: 'size' can now be null (was integer).
- **GET /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents/{document_id}**: 'uploaded_by_id' can now be null (was uuid string).
- **PUT /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents/{document_id}**: DocumentOut.extension is now nullable (string|null).
- **PUT /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents/{document_id}**: DocumentOut.hash is now nullable (string|null).
- **PUT /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents/{document_id}**: DocumentOut.mime_type is now nullable (string|null).
- **PUT /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents/{document_id}**: DocumentOut.size is now nullable (integer|null).
- **PUT /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents/{document_id}**: DocumentOut.uploaded_by_id is now nullable (uuid string|null).
- **GET /v1/libraries/{library_id}/share**: 200 response: data[].share_with_uuid is now nullable (uuid string or null) instead of always a uuid string.
- **PUT /v1/libraries/{library_id}/share**: Response field share_with_uuid may now be null (previously always a UUID string).
- **GET /v1/models**: Removed the 422 Validation Error response from the spec.

### New features

- **GET /v1/agents**: Added deployment_chat query filter.
- **GET /v1/agents**: Added sources query filter (api|playground|agent_builder_v1).
- **GET /v1/agents**: Added name query filter.
- **GET /v1/agents**: Added id query filter.
- **GET /v1/agents**: Added metadata query filter (application/json in query).
- **GET /v1/agents**: Added deployment_chat property to Agent response.
- **GET /v1/agents**: Added source property to Agent response.
- **GET /v1/agents**: Added versions property (array of integers) to Agent response.
- **GET /v1/agents**: Added metadata property to Agent response.
- **GET /v1/agents**: Updated Agent.required to include versions, deployment_chat, and source.
- **POST /v1/agents**: Added optional metadata field to AgentCreationRequest.
- **POST /v1/agents**: Added new properties to Agent response: deployment_chat (boolean), source (string), versions (array of integers), and optional metadata.
- **POST /v1/agents**: Updated Agent.required to include versions, deployment_chat, and source.
- **POST /v1/agents/completions**: Added optional metadata field allowing arbitrary key-value metadata to be sent.
- **POST /v1/agents/completions**: SystemMessage content array now accepts oneOf [TextChunk, ThinkChunk] (previously only TextChunk).
- **DELETE /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: Added DELETE /v1/agents/{agent_id} to delete an agent; returns 204 No Content on success and 422 for validation errors.
- **GET /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: Added optional query parameter agent_version (integer, string, or null).
- **GET /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: Added deployment_chat boolean property to Agent response.
- **GET /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: Added metadata property to Agent response.
- **GET /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: Added source string property to Agent response.
- **GET /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: Added versions array property to Agent response.
- **GET /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: Updated required fields to include versions, deployment_chat, and source.
- **PATCH /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: Added optional deployment_chat field to AgentUpdateRequest.
- **PATCH /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: Added optional metadata field to AgentUpdateRequest for custom key-values.
- **PATCH /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: Added optional metadata field to Agent response.
- **GET /v1/agents/{agent_id}/aliases**: New endpoint GET /v1/agents/{agent_id}/aliases to list all version aliases for a given agent, returning alias, version, created_at, and updated_at.
- **PUT /v1/agents/{agent_id}/aliases**: Added PUT /v1/agents/{agent_id}/aliases to create or update an agent's alias to a specific version.
- **PATCH /v1/agents/{agent_id}/version**: Added deployment_chat (boolean) property to Agent response (now required).
- **PATCH /v1/agents/{agent_id}/version**: Added metadata (nullable object) property to Agent response.
- **PATCH /v1/agents/{agent_id}/version**: Added source (string) property to Agent response (now required).
- **PATCH /v1/agents/{agent_id}/version**: Added versions (array of integers) property to Agent response (now required).
- **PATCH /v1/agents/{agent_id}/version**: Updated Agent response required fields to include deployment_chat, source, and versions.
- **GET /v1/agents/{agent_id}/versions**: Adds GET /v1/agents/{agent_id}/versions to list all versions for a specific agent with full agent context; supports pagination via page and page_size and returns an array of agent version objects.
- **GET /v1/agents/{agent_id}/versions/{version}**: Adds GET /v1/agents/{agent_id}/versions/{version} to retrieve a specific agent version by number, returning the agent's configuration and metadata for that version.
- **POST /v1/audio/transcriptions**: Added context_bias array to bias recognition toward specific tokens.
- **POST /v1/audio/transcriptions**: Added diarize boolean to enable speaker diarization.
- **POST /v1/audio/transcriptions**: Added 'word' as an allowed timestamp granularity option.
- **POST /v1/audio/transcriptions**: Added score field to each transcription segment.
- **POST /v1/audio/transcriptions**: Added speaker_id field to each transcription segment for diarization results.
- **POST /v1/audio/transcriptions#stream**: Added context_bias array parameter for vocabulary biasing
- **POST /v1/audio/transcriptions#stream**: Added diarize boolean parameter to enable speaker diarization
- **POST /v1/audio/transcriptions#stream**: timestamp_granularities now supports word-level timestamps in addition to segment
- **POST /v1/audio/transcriptions#stream**: TranscriptionStreamSegmentDelta may include speaker_id for diarization
- **POST /v1/audio/transcriptions#stream**: TranscriptionSegmentChunk may include speaker_id for diarization
- **POST /v1/audio/transcriptions#stream**: TranscriptionSegmentChunk may include score for segment confidence
- **GET /v1/batch/jobs**: Added nullable 'outputs' array property to each BatchJobOut item in the response.
- **POST /v1/batch/jobs**: Added new allowed endpoint values: /v1/ocr, /v1/classifications, /v1/chat/classifications, /v1/conversations, /v1/audio/transcriptions
- **POST /v1/batch/jobs**: input_files is now nullable (anyOf: array or null) instead of strictly an array
- **POST /v1/batch/jobs**: input_files is no longer required
- **POST /v1/batch/jobs**: Added requests property to submit inline batch requests (up to 10,000 items)
- **POST /v1/batch/jobs**: Added outputs field to BatchJobOut for inline results
- **GET /v1/batch/jobs/{job_id}**: Added optional 'inline' query parameter to request inline results.
- **GET /v1/batch/jobs/{job_id}**: Added 'outputs' field to response schema for inline results when requested.
- **POST /v1/batch/jobs/{job_id}/cancel**: Added optional 'outputs' property to 200 response (array of objects or null).
- **POST /v1/chat/classifications**: SystemMessage content now supports a 'thinking' (ThinkChunk) content chunk in addition to text.
- **POST /v1/chat/classifications**: SystemMessage content array items now use a discriminator ('type') with oneOf (TextChunk | ThinkChunk) instead of a single TextChunk schema.
- **POST /v1/chat/completions**: Added optional metadata field to attach arbitrary key-value metadata to the request.
- **POST /v1/chat/completions**: SystemMessage.content arrays now support ThinkChunk in addition to TextChunk.
- **POST /v1/chat/moderations**: Added support for 'thinking' chunks in SystemMessage content arrays (single and batched inputs).
- **POST /v1/chat/moderations**: SystemMessage content array items changed from a single TextChunk object to a discriminated union of [TextChunk, ThinkChunk] (single and batched inputs).
- **POST /v1/classifications**: Added optional 'metadata' field (object or null) to request body.
- **POST /v1/classifications**: Deduplicated 'model' in required list; still requires 'input' and 'model'.
- **GET /v1/conversations**: Added optional metadata query parameter to filter conversations.
- **GET /v1/conversations**: Added metadata field to ModelConversation objects in responses.
- **GET /v1/conversations**: Added agent_version field to AgentConversation objects in responses.
- **GET /v1/conversations**: Added metadata field to AgentConversation objects in responses.
- **POST /v1/conversations**: Added optional agent_version to select a specific agent version (string, integer, or null).
- **POST /v1/conversations**: Added optional metadata object for custom key/value metadata.
- **POST /v1/conversations**: Added ThinkChunk (type "thinking") to MessageInput content chunks.
- **POST /v1/conversations**: Added ThinkChunk (type "thinking") to MessageOutput content chunks within inputs array.
- **POST /v1/conversations**: Broadened ToolFileChunk.tool to accept any string in addition to built-in connector enum (MessageInput content).
- **POST /v1/conversations**: Broadened ToolFileChunk.tool to accept any string in addition to built-in connector enum (MessageOutput content within inputs).
- **POST /v1/conversations**: Broadened ToolReferenceChunk.tool to accept any string in addition to built-in connector enum (MessageOutput content within inputs).
- **POST /v1/conversations**: ToolExecutionEntry.name now accepts any string in addition to built-in connector enum.
- **POST /v1/conversations**: Added ThinkChunk (type "thinking") to MessageOutput content chunks.
- **POST /v1/conversations**: Broadened ToolFileChunk.tool to accept any string in addition to built-in connector enum (MessageOutput content).
- **POST /v1/conversations**: Broadened ToolReferenceChunk.tool to accept any string in addition to built-in connector enum (MessageOutput content).
- **POST /v1/conversations**: ToolExecutionEntry.name now accepts any string in addition to built-in connector enum.
- **POST /v1/conversations**: usage.connectors now allows any string keys; removed restriction to built-in connector names.
- **POST /v1/conversations#stream**: Added optional agent_version to specify a particular agent version (string or integer).
- **POST /v1/conversations#stream**: Added optional metadata object for custom key/value metadata on the conversation.
- **POST /v1/conversations#stream**: New thinking (ThinkChunk) content type supported in user/assistant input message content.
- **POST /v1/conversations#stream**: New thinking (ThinkChunk) content type can appear in streamed message.output.delta content.
- **POST /v1/conversations#stream**: Tool identifiers are more permissive. Fields now accept any string in addition to built-in enums.
- **POST /v1/conversations#stream**: ToolExecution events now allow any string for name in addition to built-ins.
- **POST /v1/conversations#stream**: In streamed message.output.delta content, tool fields now allow any string in addition to built-ins.
- **POST /v1/conversations#stream**: usage.connectors in ResponseDoneEvent is now an open map of integers (no restricted keys).
- **DELETE /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}**: New endpoint DELETE /v1/conversations/{conversation_id} to delete a conversation by ID; returns 204 on success and 422 for validation errors.
- **GET /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}**: Added optional metadata field to ModelConversation response.
- **GET /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}**: Added optional metadata field to AgentConversation response.
- **GET /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}**: Added optional agent_version to AgentConversation (string | integer | null).
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}**: Added new 'thinking' content chunk (ThinkChunk) for message inputs/outputs in request payloads.
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}**: ToolFileChunk.tool now accepts any string in addition to built-in connectors in request messages.
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}**: ToolReferenceChunk.tool now accepts any string in addition to built-in connectors in request MessageOutputEntry content.
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}**: ToolExecutionEntry.name now accepts any string (custom tool) as well as built-ins in request.
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}#stream**: Added support for ThinkChunk (type="thinking") in request message content (inputs) for both MessageInputEntry and MessageOutputEntry.
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}#stream**: Broadened tool identifiers to accept arbitrary strings in request: ToolFileChunk.tool, ToolReferenceChunk.tool, and ToolExecutionEntry.name.
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}#stream**: Relaxed usage.connectors to a free-form map of connector names to integers (removed fixed key set).
- **GET /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/history**: ToolFileChunk.tool now accepts any string (custom tools) in addition to built-in enum; title changed to "Tool".
- **GET /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/history**: ToolReferenceChunk.tool now accepts any string (custom tools) in addition to built-in enum; title changed to "Tool".
- **GET /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/history**: ToolExecutionEntry.name now accepts any string (custom tool names) in addition to built-in enum; title changed to "Name".
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/restart**: Added optional agent_version to select a specific agent version when restarting.
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/restart**: Added optional metadata field for custom conversation metadata.
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/restart**: Added structured thinking content (ThinkChunk) to message content arrays in requests (for both MessageInputEntry and MessageOutputEntry content).
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/restart**: ToolFileChunk.tool now accepts any string (not only built-in connectors) in requests.
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/restart**: ToolReferenceChunk.tool in requests now accepts any string (not only built-in connectors).
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/restart**: ToolExecutionEntry.name in requests now accepts any string (not only built-in connectors).
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/restart#stream**: Added optional agent_version to select a specific agent version when restarting.
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/restart#stream**: Added optional metadata field to attach custom metadata to the conversation.
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/restart#stream**: Added ThinkChunk (type=thinking) to MessageInputEntry content chunks.
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/restart#stream**: Added ThinkChunk (type=thinking) to MessageOutputEntry content chunks (when providing past outputs).
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/restart#stream**: Relaxed tool identifiers to accept arbitrary strings in ToolFileChunk (input/output) and ToolReferenceChunk (output).
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/restart#stream**: ToolExecutionEntry.name now accepts arbitrary strings in addition to built-ins.
- **POST /v1/conversations/{conversation_id}/restart#stream**: Added ThinkChunk (type=thinking) to streamed message.output.delta content.
- **POST /v1/embeddings**: Added encoding_format to select response embedding format (float or base64).
- **POST /v1/embeddings**: Added optional metadata object for attaching arbitrary metadata.
- **POST /v1/embeddings**: Response data.items schema changed from an array of item-schemas (tuple style) to a single item schema for arrays.
- **GET /v1/files**: Added query parameter include_total (boolean, default true) to control inclusion of total count.
- **GET /v1/files**: Added query parameter mimetypes to filter by MIME types.
- **POST /v1/fim/completions**: Added optional metadata field to request body for arbitrary key-value data.
- **GET /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents**: Added optional filters_attributes query parameter (string|null).
- **GET /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents**: Added attributes field to DocumentOut (object map or null).
- **GET /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents**: Added url field to DocumentOut (string or null).
- **POST /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents**: Added 'attributes' (object|null) to DocumentOut in 200/201 responses.
- **POST /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents**: Added 'url' (string|null) to DocumentOut in 200/201 responses.
- **GET /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents/{document_id}**: Added new 'attributes' property to document metadata (object or null).
- **GET /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents/{document_id}**: Added new 'url' property to document metadata (string or null).
- **PUT /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents/{document_id}**: Added optional attributes object to request body for custom document attributes.
- **PUT /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents/{document_id}**: Added attributes field to DocumentOut (nullable object).
- **PUT /v1/libraries/{library_id}/documents/{document_id}**: Added url field to DocumentOut (string or null).
- **DELETE /v1/libraries/{library_id}/share**: Request body org_id is now nullable (uuid string or null) instead of strictly uuid string.
- **DELETE /v1/libraries/{library_id}/share**: Request body org_id is no longer required.
- **DELETE /v1/libraries/{library_id}/share**: Response property share_with_uuid is now nullable (uuid string or null).
- **PUT /v1/libraries/{library_id}/share**: Request field org_id is now nullable (string or null) instead of strictly a UUID string.
- **PUT /v1/libraries/{library_id}/share**: org_id was removed from required request fields (now optional).
- **GET /v1/models**: Added new capability flags (audio, audio_transcription, moderation, ocr) to both base and fine-tuned model cards.
- **GET /v1/models**: Changed default of capabilities.completion_chat from true to false for base and fine-tuned model cards.
- **GET /v1/models**: Changed default of capabilities.function_calling from true to false for base and fine-tuned model cards.
- **GET /v1/models/{model_id}**: Added new capability flags to model capabilities (audio, audio_transcription, moderation, ocr) for both base and fine-tuned models.
- **GET /v1/models/{model_id}**: Changed default values of capabilities.completion_chat and capabilities.function_calling from true to false for both base and fine-tuned models.
- **POST /v1/moderations**: Added optional metadata field to ClassificationRequest (object or null).
- **POST /v1/moderations**: Deduplicated required list: removed duplicate 'model'.
- **POST /v1/ocr**: Added document_annotation_prompt to guide structured extraction for the whole document
- **POST /v1/ocr**: Added extract_header and extract_footer flags to optionally extract page headers and footers
- **POST /v1/ocr**: Added table_format option to control table output format (markdown or html)
- **POST /v1/ocr**: Added header, footer, hyperlinks, and tables to each page in the OCR response

### Documentation fixes

- **GET /v1/agents**: Added description to page parameter.
- **GET /v1/agents**: Added description to page_size parameter.
- **GET /v1/agents**: Added description to completion_args.prediction.
- **GET /v1/agents**: Moved description from response_format.type to response_format (doc-only).
- **GET /v1/agents**: Added description and examples to response_format (doc-only).
- **POST /v1/agents**: Documentation updates for completion_args: added prediction description; added response_format description and examples; removed description from response_format.type.
- **POST /v1/agents**: Documentation updates in response completion_args: added prediction description; added response_format description and examples; removed description from response_format.type.
- **POST /v1/agents/completions**: Clarified frequency_penalty description (formatting and wording).
- **POST /v1/agents/completions**: Clarified presence_penalty description (formatting and wording).
- **POST /v1/agents/completions**: Added detailed description to prompt_mode enum option.
- **POST /v1/agents/completions**: Expanded response_format description to clarify json_object and json_schema modes.
- **POST /v1/agents/completions**: Added examples for response_format usage, including json_schema example.
- **POST /v1/agents/completions**: Shortened and clarified prediction description.
- **POST /v1/agents/completions**: Added example response payload for a typical completion.
- **GET /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: Route description updated to mention agent_version and alias support.
- **GET /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: Added description for completion_args.prediction.
- **GET /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: Added description for completion_args.response_format object.
- **GET /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: Added examples to completion_args.response_format object.
- **GET /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: Removed description from completion_args.response_format.properties.type (moved to parent object).
- **PATCH /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: completion_args.prediction received a descriptive docstring (no schema change).
- **PATCH /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: response_format docs updated: description moved to object level and examples added; type.description removed.
- **PATCH /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: completion_args.prediction in response gained a descriptive docstring (no schema change).
- **PATCH /v1/agents/{agent_id}**: response_format docs in response updated: description moved to object level and examples added; type.description removed.
- **PATCH /v1/agents/{agent_id}/version**: Added description to completion_args.prediction object.
- **PATCH /v1/agents/{agent_id}/version**: Added description to completion_args.response_format object.
- **PATCH /v1/agents/{agent_id}/version**: Added examples to completion_args.response_format object.
- **PATCH /v1/agents/{agent_id}/version**: Removed description from completion_args.response_format.type (moved to object-level).
- **POST /v1/audio/transcriptions**: Added description and examples for the model field.
- **POST /v1/audio/transcriptions**: Added example response under 200/application/json.
- **POST /v1/audio/transcriptions#stream**: Summary capitalization updated
- **POST /v1/batch/jobs**: Endpoint now includes a description and examples
- **POST /v1/batch/jobs**: Added detailed description for input_files including JSONL structure
- **POST /v1/batch/jobs**: Added description for agent_id (mentions deprecated agents API usage)
- **POST /v1/batch/jobs**: Added description and examples for model
- **POST /v1/batch/jobs**: Added description for metadata
- **POST /v1/batch/jobs**: Added description for timeout_hours
- **GET /v1/batch/jobs/{job_id}**: Route description updated to document the optional 'inline' parameter.
